Erro in chit (all items on one chit) The printing error may be caused by the following reason. Please check and press Yes to try again.\n 1. Printer is not powered on.\n 2. Hardware failure or out of papers(Please look at the indicator lights).\n 3. Printer cable is loose or not connected to ports.\n 4. Local network problem(please check the connection between modem, router, printer and POS).\n 5. If the problem still can︲t be solved by above solutions, please contact after service.
